hero.title: The Future of Real World Assets is Tokenized
hero.desc: PrimeX is a multi-chain RWA platform that tokenizes traditional financial assets with licensed exchanges like DIGIFT and Kraken, ensuring accurate pricing and reliable investments.

platform.hero_desc: PrimeX is more than a tokenization tool; it's a complete financial operating system. From structuring to lifecycle management.

trusted.title: Built on Trust
trusted.subtitle: The pillars of institutional adoption.
trusted.t1_desc: Embedded Reg D/S rules, automated accredited investor verification (KYC/KYB) & AML checks ensure every transaction is legally compliant.
trusted.t2_desc: Smart contracts audited by top-tier firms. Multi-sig & MPC key management technology eliminates single points of failure.
trusted.t3_desc: Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZK) allow for 'verify without reveal' privacy, balancing regulatory transparency with business confidentiality.

faqs.q1: Who can invest in PrimeX products?
faqs.a1: Accredited investors and qualified institutions who pass our KYC/KYB checks.
faqs.a2: Yes. All underlying assets are held in bankruptcy-remote SPVs or by regulated custodians.

The investments mentioned are available only to qualified investors in eligible jurisdictions. Liquidity is not guaranteed. summary: PrimeX proudly presents a groundbreaking digital securities offering: the PrimeX xAI Investment Token. This token represents ownership in participating shares of a segregated portfolio within a Cayman Islands CIMA-regulated fund that holds direct equity in xAI Corp., one of the most promising artificial intelligence companies globally.
This tokenization initiative is conducted in partnership with DigiFT (the MAS-regulated Singapore exchange), bringing institutional-grade private market exposure to the blockchain ecosystem.
The structure utilizes a Segregated Portfolio Company (SPC) model with participating shares, enhanced by a trust arrangement to ensure robust investor protection and regulatory credibility.
pxai.primaryAsset: Equity position in xAI Corp., an advanced AI research company.
pxai.investmentFocus: Artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies.
pxai.portfolioStatus: Dedicated segregated portfolio with a trust arrangement to enhance investor protection and regulatory credibility.
structurePoints: Participating shares in a Cayman Islands CIMA-regulated Segregated Portfolio Company (SPC).
Direct ownership of xAI Corp. equity.
Eliminates counterparty risk found in synthetic exposure models.

tokenSpecs.name: PrimeX xAI Investment Token
tokenSpecs.security_type: Digital asset representing participating shares in SPC

summary: The PrimeX T-Bill Token offers digital access to short-term US Treasury Bills. Each token is 1:1 backed by real-world treasury obligations held in custody by regulated institutions.
This structure provides investors with a secure, yield-bearing instrument with high liquidity and minimal risk.
Managed in partnership with DigiFT, the platform ensures daily NAV updates and seamless redemption.
tbill.portfolioStatus: Fully backed by physical assets in regulated custody.

summary: Direct exposure to SpaceX through a dedicated Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV).
SpaceX is a leader in space transportation and satellite communications, currently valued at over $200B.
Tokens represent beneficial ownership in the SPV that holds the underlying SpaceX shares.
spx.portfolioStatus: Direct equity holdings in pre-IPO shares.

summary: 1:1 backed tokenized shares of Tesla Inc. (TSLA), enabling 24/7 trading on regulated digital asset exchanges.
Each token is collateralized by one share of TSLA stock held by a regulated custodian.
Investors receive dividends and corporate action benefits directly via smart contracts.
A diversified portfolio of certified green bonds financing renewable energy projects and sustainable infrastructure globally.
Targeting steady returns while maximizing environmental impact.
All underlying bonds meet the Climate Bonds Standard (CBS).
grn.investmentFocus: Renewable Energy, Water Management, Green Buildings.

summary: Paxos Gold (PAXG) is a digital asset where each token is backed by one fine troy ounce of a London Good Delivery gold bar.
Tokens represent legal ownership of physical gold held in Brink's vaults.
PrimeX provides a regulated gateway for institutional allocation into PAXG.
Access to a diversified portfolio of senior secured loans to middle-market technology and services companies.
Targeting high single-digit or low double-digit net returns.
All loans are 1st lien and backed by company assets.
